title: Network worker thread vs child process

labels.name: scope-performance
labels.description: Performance issue and ideas to improve performance.

body:
Metrics when running the network in a child process (**feat1**) vs a worker thread (**stable**). Beacon nodes have `--subscribeAllSubnets` flag set and `--network.useWorker` is enabled now by default as well. Both instances are on **v1.11.1**, the branch for running the network in a child process can be found here https://github.com/ChainSafe/lodestar/compare/unstable...nflaig/network-worker-process2.

### Event loop lag NETWORK WORKER

Significant reduction in event loop lag when using a child process

#### Child process (feat1-mainnet-hzax41)
![image](https://github.com/ChainSafe/lodestar/assets/38436224/099e63c1-73d6-46b5-bb5c-bcff9044d80e)

#### Worker thread (stable-mainnet-hzax41)
![image](https://github.com/ChainSafe/lodestar/assets/38436224/6d49a871-fbe9-4560-970e-ce70797a67c8)

### Event loop lag BEACON

Main thread event loop lag is down as well if child process is used

#### Child process (feat1-mainnet-hzax41)
![image](https://github.com/ChainSafe/lodestar/assets/38436224/db79b3eb-0916-4d33-8392-a8b323faa692)

#### Worker thread (stable-mainnet-hzax41)
![image](https://github.com/ChainSafe/lodestar/assets/38436224/728fadce-856e-4a3f-b09d-f902830ec856)

### Prometheus scrape duration

The scrape duration is a lot higher when using a child process, likely releated to increased IPC latency and serialization / deserialization as currently the raw txt payload is serialized to base64 which is not ideal.

#### Child process (feat1-mainnet-hzax41)
![image](https://github.com/ChainSafe/lodestar/assets/38436224/f2963f2e-136a-4262-8ed4-dfa820f66a46)

#### Worker thread (stable-mainnet-hzax41)
![image](https://github.com/ChainSafe/lodestar/assets/38436224/29180be3-1fdb-4ef0-b943-fa784ceadb4c)

### Attnet mesh peers per subnet

Mesh peers seems to be much lower (possible related to higher gossib validator job wait time?)

#### Child process (feat1-mainnet-hzax41)

![image](https://github.com/ChainSafe/lodestar/assets/38436224/4c2c7f8d-a278-43d8-990c-6f459a88062a)

#### Worker thread (stable-mainnet-hzax41)

![image](https://github.com/ChainSafe/lodestar/assets/38436224/1e237394-d049-41c4-aa01-fc21c3c25b65)

### Peer connection length

Peer connection length looks pretty good ob both sides, maybe slighly better when using a child process

#### Child process (feat1-mainnet-hzax41)

![image](https://github.com/ChainSafe/lodestar/assets/38436224/3688023a-ae3f-469a-9f5c-8a96ca3460ea)

#### Worker thread (stable-mainnet-hzax41)

![image](https://github.com/ChainSafe/lodestar/assets/38436224/b8f46da9-9325-4cc6-9a16-480b46d78387)

### Gossip validation queue

Job wait time and queue length looks much better when using a worker thread. This might be related to IPC and serdes latency added when using a child process. Latency metrics are required to further investigate this.

#### Child process (feat1-mainnet-hzax41)

![image](https://github.com/ChainSafe/lodestar/assets/38436224/b3f68832-8252-491b-ac67-abe50b0fea6b)

#### Worker thread (stable-mainnet-hzax41)

![image](https://github.com/ChainSafe/lodestar/assets/38436224/2401e237-4cc4-4f8f-b296-e6ef49f14397)
